name: DGCP MaMeeFarm — Proof 447
description:
This proof documents continued agricultural labor at MaMeeFarm.

After completing work at a previous location, the worker proceeds to another area to clear weeds surrounding banana trees.
The activity reflects sequential task execution, where multiple work points are addressed consecutively within the same workday.

The clearing of weeds around banana plants is part of routine land maintenance to support plant health and future cultivation.

Captured at 08:16 AM (local time) on January 6, 2026, this record represents ongoing physical labor performed under real-world farming conditions.
